channel.title: Troy Schwab's Updates
channel.description: Latest updates from Troy Schwab's website

item.title: Vinyl DJ Set - Kolter, DJ Steaw, Oliver Dollar, and more
item.description: Second set, spinning some old favorites and new records too. A bit of a more modern sound, especially between the Kolter, Credit 00, and Tuccillo tracks. Cheers!

item.title: Major Migration
item.description: Major updates! We've finally built in a proper flask backend for the site. This is going to severely limit the bloat for migrations that we experience from hosting images directly. Hopefully this RSS is a step in the right direction too! Manual for now.

item.title: Vinyl DJ Set - First Public post
item.description: First public post on youtube. Spinning some recent newbies to the collection. Hoping we can get one or two mixes in a month now. Cheers!
